metadata.title: Visual Styles and Genres - Veo 3 Prompts
metadata.description: Comprehensive visual styles and genre-specific prompting for Veo 3 video generation

prompt_templates.name: Film Noir Classic
prompt_templates.description: Classic film noir aesthetic with high contrast lighting and dramatic shadows

prompt_structure.base_prompt: Film noir style, {contrast_level}, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, {color_palette}, {atmosphere}
prompt_structure.technical_specs: High contrast black and white or desaturated, venetian blind shadows, urban setting
prompt_structure.visual_elements: Hard shadows, smoke, rain reflections, neon signs, dramatic angles

examples.prompt: Film noir style, high contrast lighting, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, monochrome color palette, mysterious atmosphere, high contrast black and white, venetian blind shadows, urban setting, detective investigating dark alley
examples.expected_result: Classic noir aesthetic with dramatic lighting

examples.prompt: Film noir style, medium contrast lighting, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting, desaturated color palette, brooding atmosphere, high contrast black and white, venetian blind shadows, urban setting, femme fatale in smoke-filled bar

best_practices: Use hard, directional lighting for dramatic shadows
Consider desaturated or monochrome color schemes
common_mistakes: Too much fill light reducing noir contrast

prompt_templates.name: Cyberpunk Future
prompt_templates.description: Futuristic cyberpunk aesthetic with neon colors and high-tech elements

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Saturated neon lighting, digital displays, rain effects, smoke/fog atmosphere
prompt_structure.color_scheme: Electric blues, hot pinks, acid greens, purple highlights

examples.prompt: Cyberpunk style, electric blue and hot pink neon colors, futuristic technology displays, dense urban environment, heavy rain effects, saturated neon lighting, digital displays, smoke atmosphere, street scene at night

Cyberpunk style, acid green and purple neon colors, holographic technology interfaces, towering urban density, fog weather effects, saturated neon lighting, digital displays, smoke atmosphere, character in tech-enhanced environment

best_practices: Emphasize urban density and vertical architecture

prompt_templates.name: Documentary Realism
prompt_templates.description: Authentic documentary style with natural lighting and handheld camera feel

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Natural color grading, handheld camera movement, available light sources
prompt_structure.authenticity_markers: Unposed subjects, real locations, natural interactions

examples.prompt: Documentary realism style, available natural lighting, subtle handheld camera movement, authentic workplace environment, natural color grading, handheld camera movement, available light sources, workers in genuine interaction

Documentary realism style, window natural lighting, gentle handheld camera movement, authentic home environment, natural color grading, handheld camera movement, available light sources, family in natural interaction

best_practices: Use natural, available lighting when possible
Embrace slight camera movement for authenticity
Focus on genuine interactions and environments
Maintain natural color grading and minimal effects
common_mistakes: Too perfect framing losing documentary feel

prompt_templates.name: Vintage Retro
prompt_templates.description: Period-appropriate vintage aesthetic with era-specific visual characteristics

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Era-specific color grading, appropriate grain/texture, period lighting

examples.prompt: Vintage 1980s style, warm saturated color treatment, period-appropriate neon and chrome visual elements, VHS film quality, era-specific color grading, film grain texture, period lighting, retro tech environment

Vintage 1970s style, warm earthy color treatment, period-appropriate wood paneling and orange visual elements, Super 8 film quality, era-specific color grading, film grain texture, period lighting, domestic interior scene

best_practices: Use appropriate color grading for time period

prompt_templates.name: High Fashion Commercial
prompt_templates.description: Luxury fashion aesthetic with perfect lighting and stylized visuals

prompt_structure.technical_specs: Flawless lighting, high-end color grading, perfect composition, luxury materials
prompt_structure.production_values: Studio quality, professional styling, premium visual treatment

examples.prompt: High fashion style, perfect studio lighting perfection, luxury minimal aesthetic elements, sophisticated monochrome color sophistication, flawless lighting, high-end color grading, perfect composition, model in designer clothing

High fashion style, dramatic beauty lighting perfection, luxury metallic aesthetic elements, sophisticated jewel-tone color sophistication, flawless lighting, high-end color grading, perfect composition, jewelry product showcase

color_grading_approaches.stylized: Creative color manipulation for artistic effect

usage_guidelines.audience_appropriateness: Match style to target audience expectations
